title: Snacktime: Dad Jokes
dc:creator: WBUR
description: The spotlight is on r/DadJokes, which -- you guessed it -- is home to the most pun-derful, cheesy-but-lovable comedic material the internet has to offer. Starring the experts: Ben & Amory's DADS!

media:content.media:description:
Left: Ben Johnson and his dad, Kit Johnson, half way through a joke marathon in Maine. 
Right: Amory Sivertson and her dad, Tam, circa 1991.
